jam.fit
Class Fit

java.lang.Object
  jam.fit.Fit
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, PlotMouseListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
CalibFit, NonLinearFit, PeakIntensity
public abstract class Fit
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ItemListener, PlotMouseListener

This defines the necessary methods that need to be defined in order for a fit routine to work with FitControl. It also contains the dialog box that serves as the user interface.

Author:
Dale Visser, Ken Swartz
See Also:
NonLinearFit, GaussianFit

Constructor Detail

Fit

public Fit(java.lang.String name)
Class constructor.

Parameters:
name - name for dialog box and menu item
Method Detail

estimate

public abstract void estimate()
                       throws FitException
Changes parameter values to calculated estimates. Useful for NonLinearFit, which requires reasonably close guesses in order to converge on a good chi-squared minimum.

Throws:
FitException - thrown if unrecoverable error occurs during estimation
See Also:
NonLinearFit, GaussianFit.estimate()

doFit

public abstract java.lang.String doFit()
                                throws FitException
Performs calulations neccessary to find a best fit to the data.

Returns:
String containing information about the fit.
Throws:
FitException - thrown if unrecoverable error occurs during fit

                  throws FitException

reset

public void reset()
           throws FitException
Resets all the parameter to default values, which are zero for now.

Throws:
FitException - thrown if unrecoverable error occurs during reset of dialog

getParameter

protected Parameter getParameter(java.lang.String which)
Accesses a parameter in parameterTable by name.

Parameters:
which - contains the name of the parameter (same name displayed in dialog box)
Returns:
the Parameter object going by that name

calculate

public abstract double calculate(int channel)
Calculates function value for a specific channel. Uses whatever the current values are for the parameters in parameters.

Parameters:
channel - channel to evaluate fit function at
Returns:
double containing evaluation
